skill.name: flow-nexus-platform
skill.description: Comprehensive Flow Nexus platform management - authentication, sandboxes, app deployment, payments, and challenges
skill.summary: Comprehensive Flow Nexus platform management - authentication, sandboxes, app deployment, payments, ...
skill.author: Flow Nexus

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation with no executable code. It provides MCP tool definitions for Flow Nexus platform management including authentication, sandbox execution, app deployment, payments, and challenges. No security risks detected.

content.user_title: Manage Flow Nexus cloud platform with authentication and deployment
content.value_statement: Flow Nexus provides a comprehensive cloud platform for AI development with authentication, sandbox execution, and app deployment. This skill enables complete platform management through simple MCP tool calls.
actual_capabilities: Register and authenticate users with email/password
Create and manage development sandboxes with multiple templates
Manage credits and payments with auto-refill
Complete coding challenges and earn rewards
Store files with public/private bucket access
limitations: Requires Flow Nexus account and API access
Credit system may incur costs for premium features
Sandbox execution limited by tier and available credits
Network access required for all platform operations

use_cases.title: Rapid AI prototyping in sandboxes
use_cases.description: Create isolated environments for testing AI models and applications with pre-configured templates

use_cases.title: Deploy production applications
use_cases.description: Browse marketplace templates and deploy complete applications with database and environment configuration

use_cases.title: Practice coding with challenges
use_cases.description: Solve algorithm challenges, earn credits, and track progress on leaderboards

prompt_templates.title: Create development sandbox
prompt_templates.scenario: Need Node.js environment for API development
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a Flow Nexus sandbox with Node.js template, install express and cors packages, set up environment variables for PORT 3000 and NODE_ENV development

prompt_templates.title: Deploy from template
prompt_templates.prompt: Search for React templates in the Flow Nexus marketplace and deploy the most popular one with my API keys configured

prompt_templates.title: Complete coding challenge
prompt_templates.prompt: Find an intermediate difficulty algorithm challenge on Flow Nexus and help me solve it in JavaScript

prompt_templates.title: Monitor deployment
prompt_templates.prompt: Get real-time execution logs for my deployed application and check if there are any errors or performance issues

output_examples.input: Create a Python sandbox for machine learning with numpy and pandas

best_practices: Clean up unused sandboxes regularly to save credits and avoid unnecessary charges
Use environment variables for sensitive data instead of hardcoding in sandbox code
Start with free tier templates before purchasing premium applications from marketplace
anti_patterns: Never hardcode API keys or credentials directly in sandbox code or deployment configurations
Avoid keeping sandboxes running idle - they consume credits continuously while active
Don't upload sensitive personal data to public storage buckets without encryption

faq.question: Is Flow Nexus compatible with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, Flow Nexus integrates seamlessly with Claude Code through MCP tools and provides specialized Claude Code sandbox templates

faq.question: What are the credit costs for different services?
faq.answer: Sandbox execution costs 0.5-5 credits/hour, swarm operations 1-10 credits/hour, and neural training 5-50 credits per job

faq.question: Can I integrate Flow Nexus with my existing CI/CD pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, Flow Nexus provides API endpoints and webhook support for integration with GitHub Actions, Jenkins, and other CI/CD tools

faq.question: How is my data secured on Flow Nexus?
faq.answer: Data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Private buckets require authentication and you control access permissions for all resources

faq.question: What happens if my sandbox crashes or times out?
faq.answer: Sandboxes automatically save state before termination. You can restart from the last checkpoint or access logs to debug issues

faq.question: How does Flow Nexus compare to other cloud platforms?
faq.answer: Flow Nexus specializes in AI development workflows with integrated coding challenges, pre-configured AI templates, and gamified learning
